name: Trans Ops - Transitional Operations
description:
Fun, Fast Paced, Third Person Tactical Shooter. 5 Original Maps (more to come!) with well-known game modes such as, Capture the Flag, Team Death Match Conquest, and many more. Trans Ops is a Multiplayer Shooter that also offer Single player modes for those players who just want to "warm up" against the in-game AI. BOTS! Both Single player and Multiplayer modes offer playing the Bots that use the same weapons you use and complete the same game mode objectives! Difficulty settings for bots, giving a fair chance or making things impossible!

Trans Ops was created in Unreal Engine 5.1 with Lumen Global lighting and Lumen Reflections, giving the game a smooth, clean, crisp look! - Currently Multiplayer Sessions are User Created. The plan is to have dedicated servers where players vote to transition in and out of maps and modes working as a team completing different operations.


Features:

  • Single player and Multiplayer!

  • Bots, AI that will hunt you down and complete objectives in the game mode.

  • Game Modes with Respawn and one life.

  • 8 Game modes including, Team Deathmatch, Search and Destroy, Conquest, Team Elimination, Rush, Capture the Flag, Kill Confirm, and Free for All! More to come.

  • 5 Original Maps and many more to come!

  • 8 different characters, 3 SWAT 5 MERC. More to come including Female variant and customizations.

  • Loadout includes, AR's, SMG's, Sniper Rifles, LMG's, Pistols, Shotguns, Grenades, Claymores and many more to come!

  • Character Classes, Assault, Support and Medic offering different in game perks for players to use, ei: health, ammo.

  • Pick up teammates or enemies weapons from ground after they die, ammo refills on select maps and modes.

  • Kill Steaks and UAV's

  • In game HUD that works with UAV System.

  • Spectate Mode

  • In game menus for options/setting, also allowing you to switch teams and load out

  • User Created Multiplayer Sessions, Dedicated Servers will be coming soon.
